name: Anomaly (creiht)
description:
Anomaly - Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

While you and your partner are investigating an anomaly in deep space, the ships controls become unresponsive and you are flying completely Out Of Control through an asteroid field!  You must shoot down any asteroids in your path while you pilot tries to regain control of the ship.  Perhaps destroying enough anomalies will help!

Assets by Kenney 

Music by Bert Cole
